name: Rise Of Empire
description: RISE OF EMPIRE is a completely free, zero-threshold Play&Earn Game-fi project that allows players to play by acquiring different levels of generals, including PvE, PvP, PvB, mining, and national battles. The in-game exchange can be traded using the game's governance tokens - diamonds, which can be exchanged 1:1 with the project's tokens, enabling players to make a profit.
